About the Company: Milton is one of the oldest players with in the organized plastic Industry in India.The Company is equipped with state-of-the-art manufacturing units at Pune and Silvassa that have been awarded the ISO 9001: 2000 certification for successful implementation of Quality Management Systems.Since its inception in 1972 as a small unit producing plastic items like tumblers, mugs, boxes, cases and undertaking small labor jobs; Milton has got to the Numero Uno position, thanks to millions of satisfied customers.
